workload_estimation.rationale: Part-time mentoring role with flexible schedule. Client already making progress, needs guidance rather than hands-on coding.

rate_tier.justification: Mentoring + architectural guidance role requiring SaaS-building experience. Mid-to-senior tier appropriate for technical mentorship.

pricing_structure.rationale: Hourly approach with weekly cap provides flexibility while protecting both parties. Monthly estimate assumes 15 hours/week average.

market_benchmark.validation: Rate sits within 80-120% of market benchmark (75-150 range)

assumptions: Flexible schedule allows for async communication
Focus is on guidance, not hands-on coding
Client wants to move from idea → MVP → production

risk_notes.risk: Scope creep from mentoring to hands-on coding
risk_notes.mitigation: Clearly define boundaries: guidance vs. implementation. Use clarifying questions in proposal.

risk_notes.risk: Vague 'part-time' definition could lead to expectation mismatch
risk_notes.mitigation: Propose weekly hour cap (15 hours) with flexible scheduling.

risk_notes.risk: Client might expect full-time availability for part-time pay
risk_notes.mitigation: Set clear communication boundaries: scheduled sessions + async availability windows.

clarifying_questions_for_pricing: What's your expected weekly time commitment?
Do you prefer scheduled sessions or async communication?
Are there specific milestones or deadlines we should work toward?
